parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Earliest entry timestamp in UTC (inclusive, ie. '2018-03-20T04:07:56.271Z')

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Latest entry timestamp in UTC (inclusive, ie. '2018-03-20T04:07:56.271Z')

200.description: Tweets with stamps between startDate and endDate

id.description: The unique identifier of the tweet

stamp.description: The timestamp, in UTC, of the tweet
